paper_abstract: This article gives results on fixed basis frame valued neighborhood topological groups and stratified neighborhood topological groups, includes some characterization theorems, and presents the uniformizability of stratified neighborhood topological groups within the unified approach of Gutierrez Garcia, DePrada Vicente, and Sostak. It is shown that for a frame L, the category L-NGrp is topological over Grp with respect to the forgetful functor. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the category of fixed basis frame valued topological groups
